_readme: This file simulates a list of packages installed in the active directory of a virtual project.
It will be compared against staged.installed.json.

packages.name: other/removed
packages.description: This project is removed but there should be no error because it is not a Drupal project.

packages.name: other/dev-removed
packages.description: This project is removed but there should be no error because it is not a Drupal project.
